This tool can calculate the levitation distance for a given [[Levitation]] level and duration.

<onlyinclude>{|- class="wikitable calculator-container calculatorgadget-enabled" data-calculator-refresh-on-load="true" style="display: none; {{{style|}}}"
! colspan=2 | Levitation
|-
| Level || {{Simplecalc|type=range|min=1|max=256|step=1|id=l|formula=l2|default=1}} {{Simplecalc|type=number|min=1|max=256|step=1|id=l2|formula=l|default=1}}{{Simplecalc|type=hidden|id=gfd1f|formula=-49/1080*l}}
|-
| Duration (sec) || {{Simplecalc|type=number|min=0|id=sec|default=10|step=0.05}}{{Simplecalc|type=hidden|id=t|formula=floor(sec*20)|default=200}}{{Simplecalc|type=hidden|id=ft1|formula=1-pow(0.784,t)}}
|-
| Distance (after the duration) || {{Simplecalc|type=plain|decimals=4|id=d|formula=gfd1f*(ft1/0.216-t)}}{{Simplecalc|type=hidden|id=vt|formula=-gfd1f*ft1}}{{Simplecalc|type=hidden|id=tp|formula=ceil(-log(25/98*vt+1)/log(0.98))}}{{Simplecalc|type=hidden|id=vt2|formula=vt*0.98-0.0784}}{{Simplecalc|type=hidden|id=tp2|formula=ceil(-log(25/98*vt2+1)/log(0.98))}}
|-
| Max height (consider momentum) || {{Simplecalc|type=plain|decimals=4|formula=d+50*((vt+3.92)*(1-pow(0.98,tp))-0.0784*tp)}} or {{Simplecalc|type=plain|decimals=4|formula=d+50*((vt2+3.92)*(1-pow(0.98,tp2))-0.0784*tp2)}}
|}</onlyinclude>
